Demo.Description: This demo is designed to show how the Relay feature of the Windows Azure Service Bus can be used to build hybrid applications with services in the cloud and on-premises. This demo involves running a simple ASP.NET MVC Mobile Web Application that retrieves data from an on-premises Northwind SQL Server database through a WCF service. The WCF service is running in a console application for this demo, so you can see a trace of the calls to the service.
Demo.Title: Service Bus Relay - Northwind Mobile Web
